segments.name: Recently Engaged
segments.description: Subscribers who opened an email in the last 30 days
segments.query: status = 'active' AND last_email_opened_at > CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'

segments.name: New Subscribers
segments.description: Subscribers who joined in the last 7 days
segments.query: status = 'active' AND confirmed_at > CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'

segments.name: Dormant Subscribers
segments.description: Subscribers who haven't opened an email in 90+ days
segments.query: status = 'active' AND (last_email_opened_at < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '90 days' OR last_email_opened_at IS NULL)

segments.name: Highly Engaged
segments.description: Subscribers who frequently open and click emails

segments.name: Calculator Users
segments.description: Subscribers who signed up through calculators

segments.name: Blog Readers
segments.description: Subscribers who signed up through blog content
